body: I don't think we're going to add more complexity to url.URL now. RawPath suffices to preserve all the information one might need to derive or need control over. As of Go 1.5, clients in this (not everyday) situation can build what they need from the pieces provided. When it's time for a rethink of the overall big picture, we'll be sure to consider this. But I'd rather not add more piecemeal.
